scripts.bundle-android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ../android/app/src/main/res
scripts.bundle-ios: react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ios/StepCounterExample/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios/StepCounterExample/Images.xcassets
